messages.subject: Re: US History book
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 09/18/2001 3:18:41 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I LOVE Phil Hoose!...he also wrote a book called It s Our World, Too! about young
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 09/18/2001 3:18:41 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Roy and I jsut started reading a new book (Idon't know
> how to make by puter underline in email) WE WEERE
> THERE< TOO! YOUNGE PEOPLE IN U. S. HISTORY by Phillip
> Hoose. We got ours through the Children's Book of the
> Month Club. It is MUCH better than I expected.
>
>

I LOVE Phil Hoose!...he also wrote a book called It's Our World, Too! about
young activists...which is also a how to book. He and his family also have a
kind of musical group in Maine, where I met them...very cool folks :)

Kathryn
